ygData.subject: RE: I'm a guide =D
ygData.msgSnippet: If anyone is interested in becoming a guide, just go to guideapp.989studios.com.  You d probably want to read their guide/GM FAQ on www.everquest.com first.
ygData.messageBody:
If anyone is interested in becoming a guide, just go to
guideapp.989studios.com. You'd probably want to read their guide/GM FAQ
on www.everquest.com first.

You don't get to choose what server you go to, they put you wherever they
feel like putting you.

- Tina

On Fri, 28 Jan 2000, Aguilar, Reuben wrote:

> From: "Aguilar, Reuben" <raguilar@...>
>
> WoW congratulations! That is very exciting!...Maybe I should apply with one
> of the new servers :O)I always wanted to be a guide.
>
> Nate Elvenstar
> 35th Mage
> "Mystic Guardians"
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Christina Norman [mailto:tina@...]
> Sent: Thursday, January 27, 2000 10:45 PM
> To: EQ_Rainbow@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_rainbow] I'm a guide =D
>
>
> From: Christina Norman <tina@...>
>
>
> My guide application was accepted, and I've been selected to serve on
> Rodcet Knife. This was a wondeful surprise for me, as I know a lot of
> people
> on this list play there. I won't be giving any preferential treatment
> of course, but it will be nice to be able to say hi to you all =)
>
> My training is happening this Saturday, I'm not sure when I'll start
> guiding.
>
> - Tina
>
>
